.table baseEdge
----
application/datalog

edge{from: F, to: T} :-
  baseEdge{from: F, to: T} |
  baseEdge{from: F, to: I} & edge{from: I, to: T}.
----
application/datalog

baseEdge{from: "A", to: "B"}.
----
incremental-datalog/trace
baseEdge: [baseEdge{from: "A", to: "B"}+1]
1: [{F: "A", T: "B"}+1]
2: [{F: "A", I: "B"}+1]
0: [{F: "A", T: "B"}+1]
4: []
edge: [edge{from: "A", to: "B"}+1]
3: [{I: "A", T: "B"}+1]
4: []

baseEdge{from: "C", to: "D"}.
----
incremental-datalog/trace
baseEdge: [baseEdge{from: "C", to: "D"}+1]
1: [{F: "C", T: "D"}+1]
2: [{F: "C", I: "D"}+1]
0: [{F: "C", T: "D"}+1]
4: []
edge: [edge{from: "C", to: "D"}+1]
3: [{I: "C", T: "D"}+1]
4: []

baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}.
----
incremental-datalog/trace
baseEdge: [baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}+1]
1: [{F: "B", T: "C"}+1]
2: [{F: "B", I: "C"}+1]
0: [{F: "B", T: "C"}+1]
4: [{F: "B", I: "C", T: "D"}+1]
edge: [edge{from: "B", to: "C"}+1]
0: [{F: "B", I: "C", T: "D"}+1]
3: [{I: "B", T: "C"}+1]
edge: [edge{from: "B", to: "D"}+1]
4: [{F: "A", I: "B", T: "C"}+1]
3: [{I: "B", T: "D"}+1]
0: [{F: "A", I: "B", T: "C"}+1]
4: [{F: "A", I: "B", T: "D"}+1]
edge: [edge{from: "A", to: "C"}+1]
0: [{F: "A", I: "B", T: "D"}+1]
3: [{I: "A", T: "C"}+1]
edge: [edge{from: "A", to: "D"}+1]
4: []
3: [{I: "A", T: "D"}+1]
4: []

edge{from: F, to: T}?
----
application/datalog-results
edge{from: "A", to: "B"}; {F: "A", T: "B"}.
edge{from: "A", to: "C"}; {F: "A", T: "C"}.
edge{from: "A", to: "D"}; {F: "A", T: "D"}.
edge{from: "B", to: "C"}; {F: "B", T: "C"}.
edge{from: "B", to: "D"}; {F: "B", T: "D"}.
edge{from: "C", to: "D"}; {F: "C", T: "D"}.
